data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe the last thing you learned that made you wiser. Who taught you this, and how did you thank them for it? How will you use this knowledge to help you in the future?
data.answer: The last thing I learnt that made me wiser is punctuality. I used to be a person who would always be late for meetings and appointments. This bad habit caused me lots of troubles as people gradually distrusted me. Last month, my boyfriend told me that I need to be punctual enough if I want to grasp good work and study opportunities. He also made a timetable to remind me of the deadline of my works. In the future, I will use the knowledge of punctuality to my work and provide my employers and customers with a positive impression. (99字)
